remarks.para: One or both may be inoperative, (PF Floor Drain System).

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "DRAIN MAST HEATER(S) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If both drain mast heaters are inoperative:
Open and collar circuit breakers DRAIN MAST HTR-AIR (P37F7) and DRAIN MAST HTR-GND (P34B3).
If either drain mast heater is inoperative and it is desirable to deactivate one heater:
Open circuit breakers DRAIN MAST HTR-AIR (P37F7) and DRAIN MAST HTR GND (P34B3).
Open P37 panel. Disconnect cap and stow the power wire for the affected drain mast heater (wiring diagram 30-71-11).
For the forward Drain Mast Heater, wire 5793-20 on Terminal Block TB178 (YC3).
For the aft Drain Mast Heater, wire 5792-20 on Terminal Block TB178 (YC3).
Close circuit breakers (P37F7) and (P34B3). Close P37 panel.
